categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Korek was a male Human Sith Lord of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War.

Around 3640 BBY he was with his apprentice Solrak on Voss, where Korek sent Solrak to bring back artifacts from the Nightmare Lands. The corruption of the place, however, was too strong and Solrak asked an Imperial to retrieve the artifacts for him instead.
Lord Korek appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic during the mission "Covetous" on Voss.
